Package uk.ac.ed.inf.heatmap

Class GeoMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.heatmap.GeoMapper
  • public class GeoMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that contains the code that actually creates a heatmap. The heatmap is defined between the corners in Settings.java, to adjust them please change them there.
    Author:
    Marios Katalanos

    • Field Detail

      • corners

        private static com.mapbox.geojson.Point[] corners
        Corners to which the heatmap is constraint. It's just a reference to Settings.corners

      • vertices

        static com.mapbox.geojson.Point[][] vertices
        This the vertices matrix. It contains Points to every vertex needed to create the heatmap. It's contents can be referenced using the indexes lat - for latitude and lng - for longitude in the form vertices[lat][lng] It has dimensions (Settings.latDim+1 x Settings.lngDim+1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoMapper

        private GeoMapper()

    • Method Detail

      • generateHeatmap

        public static com.mapbox.geojson.FeatureCollection generateHeatmap​(int[][] data)
        Static method that generates heatmap based on a data matrix.
        Parameters:
        data - A 2x2 integer matrix with dimensions (Settings.latDim x Settings.lngDim).
        Returns:
        A heatmap in the form of a FeatureCollection.
